title: "Search events"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search events"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/community/event/@search/{query}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of events matching the search query specified in the request with the event titles, dates of creation and update, event types, and authors.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"query","in":"path","description":"Search query","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of events","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","example":"1"},"Uid":{"type":"string","example":"1234wda"},"CalendarId":{"type":"string","example":"calendarID"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Event Name"},"Description":{"type":"string","example":"Event Description"},"AllDayLong":{"type":"boolean","example":"false"},"Start":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-01T06:36:10.8645482Z"},"End":{"type":"string","example":"2020-12-01T06:36:10.8645482Z"},"RepeatRule":{"type":"string","example":""},"Alert":{"type":"object","properties":{"Type":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"-1"}},"title":"EventAlertWrapper"},"IsShared":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"},"CanUnsubscribe":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"},"IsEditable":{"type":"boolean","example":"false"},"Permissions":{"type":"object","properties":{"UserParams":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"2fdfe577-3c26-4736-9df9-b5a683bb8520"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Valery Zykov"}},"title":"UserParams"}}},"title":"Permissions"},"Owner":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"2fdfe577-3c26-4736-9df9-b5a683bb8520"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Valery Zykov"}},"title":"UserParams"},"Status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["Tentative","Confirmed","Cancelled"],"description":"[0 - Tentative, 1 - Confirmed, 2 - Cancelled]","example":"0"},"HasAttachments":{"type":"boolean"}},"title":"EventWrapper"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
